ygData.subject: RE: Someone PLEASE tell me why....
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya, well, I _finally_ learned my lesson.  I now have a spare drum and 20 milk and 20 muffins in the bank.  I got et by a sharkie in Qeynos Aquaducts a couple
ygData.messageBody:
Ya, well, I _finally_ learned my lesson. I now have a spare drum and 20
milk and 20 muffins in the bank. I got et by a sharkie in Qeynos Aquaducts
a couple days ago and was kinda surprised to find my self re-spawned in
HighKeep! Guess I fergot to get rebinded in Qeynos after adventuring.

Sylly
Bard of the 15th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
camped out somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. Ya, I know, but I hate those annoying "you are hungry, you are thirsty"
messages.

-----Original Message-----
From: silky@...
[mailto:silky@...]
Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 11:19 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Someone PLEASE tell me why....

From: silky@...


I KNOW why only some classes can bind - and I have no
problem with that,
even though ours is not one of them, that is not the
question.

What I want to know is WHY can't someone bind me anywhere
THEY can be bound?

Yeah, yeah - I can run really fast - a trip across 5 zones
shouldn't bother
me, well, guess what, it does.
